tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE trip_itinerary (
    trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    destination VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    activities TEXT,
    accommodation_details TEXT,
    transportation_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE accommodations (
    accommodation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    accommodation_name VARCHAR(255),
    accommodation_type VARCHAR(100),
    accommodation_location VARCHAR(255),
    check_in_date DATE,
    check_out_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE transportation (
    transport_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    transport_mode VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    departure_city VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    arrival_city VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    departure_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    arrival_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE activities (
    activity_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    activity_description TEXT,
    activity_location VARCHAR(100),
    activity_duration INTERVAL
);

CREATE TABLE accommodations (
    accommodation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    accommodation_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    accommodation_type VARCHAR(50),
    accommodation_location VARCHAR(100),
    accommodation_rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE transportation (
    transportation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    transportation_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    transportation_provider VARCHAR(50),
    transportation_departure_time TIMESTAMP,
    transportation_arrival_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE trips (
    trip_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    trip_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    trip_description TEXT,
    trip_start_date DATE,
    trip_end_date DATE,
    activity_id INT,
    accommodation_id INT,
    transportation_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE accommodations (
  accommodation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  accommodation_name VARCHAR(100),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  capacity INT,
  amenities TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE transportation (
  transportation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
  capacity INT,
  departure_datetime DATETIME,
  arrival_datetime DATETIME
);

CREATE TABLE trips (
  trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trip_name VARCHAR(100),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  total_cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE trip_details (
  trip_detail_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trip_id INT,
  activity_id INT,
  accommodation_id INT,
  transportation_id INT
);
